Class-Fighter 20 -- Male Half-Orc Fighter: 20
Strength: 20 (+5) Dexterity: 18 (+4) Constitution: 18 (+4) Intelligence: 18 (+4) Wisdom: 18 (+4) Charisma: 18 (+4)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)
Experience: 19500/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 10/15
Ability Notes: Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 20 from any)

Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 5 selections
Clever Improviser: Has the Untrained Improvisation feature
Fighter Expertise: Class Expert (Fighter)
Fighter Feats: 11 selections
Fighter Key Ability: 1 selection
General Feats: 5 selections
Half-Orc: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Orc Sight: Has the Darkvision feature
Skill Feats: 10 selections
Darkvision: Has normal b/w vision in darkness and dim light
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +30 (wisdom; master)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +28 (dexterity; expert) Gnome Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +26 (wisdom; trained)

Astral Plane Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Intimidation: +26 (charisma; trained) Society: +24 (intelligence; untrained)
Athletics: +31 (strength; master) Medicine: +24 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +24 (dexterity; untrained)
Crafting: +24 (intelligence; untrained) Midwifery Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Survival: +26 (wisdom; trained)
Deception: +26 (charisma; trained) Milling Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Taldan History Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Demon Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Mining Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Tea Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)

Skill Notes:
Battlefield Surveyor: Perception Master
Fighter Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Acrobatics, Athletics; Choose 7 from any)

Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 9 from any)

Skill Training (Troll Lore): Skill Trained (Troll Lore)
Untrained Improvisation: +20 on untrained skill checks
Assurance (Plains Lore): May forgo rolling a Plains Lore check for an automatic 32
Assurance (Survival): May forgo rolling a Survival check for an automatic 32
Clever Improviser: May use any skill untrained
Expeditious Search: May Search at 2x normal Speed
Group Coercion: May use Intimidation to Coerce 2 targets
Incredible Initiative: +2 on initiative rolls
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 288 Armor Class: 40 (dexterity; master) Class DC: Fighter: 41 (strength; master)
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Armor Mastery: Defense Master (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Armor Proficiency: Defense Trained (Heavy Armor)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Greater Weapon Specialization: Increased Weapon Specialization effects
Strength Attack Adjustment: +5
Versatile Legend: Attack Legendary (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)/Attack Master (Advanced Weapons)/Class Master (Fighter)
Weapon Legend: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)/Attack Expert (Advanced Weapons)
Advanced Weapon Training: Has proficiency with advanced weapons in chosen group equal to martial weapons
Advantageous Assault: (1) May make a Strike on a grabbed, prone, or restrained foe that inflicts +damage dice HP damage (+damage dice + 2 HP if wielded two-handed), even on failure
Aggressive Block: (F) May use Shield Block to move a foe 5' or cause them to become flat-footed (foe's choice) as a free action
Agile Grace: Reduces multiple attack penalty with agile weapons to -3/-6
Armor Expertise: Benefits from the specialization effects of medium and heavy armor
Assisting Shot: (1) Make make a ranged Strike that gives the next ally attack on the target within 1 rd +1 attack (critical success +2) if successful
Attack Of Opportunity: (R) May make a melee Strike on foe that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Battlefield Surveyor: +2 Perception for initiative
Blind-Fight: May attack concealed foes without a prior check and hidden creatures with a DC 5 check/Does not suffer flat-footed with hidden foes
Boundless Reprisals: May use an additional Reaction to use a fighter feat or class feature once per foe turn
Brutal Finish: (1) May end turn with a two-handed Strike that inflicts +2 damage dice, even on failure
Brutish Shove: (1) May make a two-handed melee Strike that inflicts flat-footed until end of turn; success allows subsequent Shove
Certain Strike: (1) May make a Strike that inflicts normal damage other than damage dice on failure
Combat Flexibility: May use a chosen fighter feat of up to 8th level each day
Combat Grab: (1) May make a melee Strike with a one-handed weapon that allows grabbing the foe with the other hand if successful for 1 rd or until foe Escapes
Combat Reflexes: May use an additional Reaction to make an Attack Of Opportunity once per turn
Debilitating Shot: (2) May make a ranged Strike that slows target for 1 rd
Desperate Finisher: (R) May use a press action after taking the last action in a turn, losing any further Reactions during the turn
Diehard: Remains alive until dying 5
Disarming Stance: (1) Stance gives +1 to Disarm and +2 vs. Disarm and allows Disarming foes two sizes larger when wielding a one-handed weapon with the other hand free
Disarming Twist: (1) Make make a Strike with a one-handed melee weapon and the other hand free that inflicts Disarm on success; failure inflicts flat-footed until the end of turn
Disruptive Stance: (1) Stance allows using Attack Of Opportunity in response to a concentrate action; any successful Strike disrupts
Double Shot: (2) May make two ranged Strikes against two foes, suffering a -2 attack penalty on each
Double Slice: (2) May make melee Strikes with two weapons simultaneously
Dual-Handed Assault: (1) May use free hand to increase the damage from a 1-handed weapon with the 2-handed trail by its number of damage dice or a weapon without that trait by one step
Dueling Dance: (1) Stance gives +2 AC when wielding a one-handed weapon with a hand free
Dueling Parry: (1) May gain +2 AC when wielding a one-handed weapon with the other hand free
Dueling Riposte: (R) While using Dueling Parry, may Strike or Disarm a foe who critically fails an attack on self
Exacting Strike: (1) May make a Strike that does not count toward multiple attack penalty on failure
Fearsome Brute: Strikes against frightened foes inflict +frightened value x 2 HP damage
Felling Strike: (2) May attack a flying foe; a successful Strike causes it to fall 120', and a critical hit grounds it for 1 rd
Fighter Weapon Mastery: Attack Master with simple and martial weapons and Attack Expert with advanced weapons of chosen group/May use critical specialization effects of all weapons with master proficiency
Flinging Shove: Aggressive Block moves foe 10' (critical success 20') or inflicts flat-footed; Brutish Shove moves foe 10' (failure 5', critical success 20')
Furious Focus: Two-handed power attacks count as single attacks for multiple attack penalty
Graceful Poise: (1) Stance allows Double Slice with an agile weapon to count as one attack
Guardian's Deflection: (R) May give an adjacent ally +2 AC when wielding a one-handed weapon with the other hand free
Guiding Finish: (1) May move target 10' to a spot within reach with a successful Strike (failure 5') when wielding a one-handed weapon with a hand free
Guiding Riposte: May move target 10' to a spot within reach with a successful Dueling Riposte Strike
Impossible Volley: (3) May make a -2 ranged Strike against all foes in a 10' radius
Improved Dueling Riposte: May use an additional Reaction to make a Dueling Riposte once per turn
Improved Flexibility: May use a chosen fighter feat of up to 14th level each day
Improved Knockdown: Knockdown automatically inflicts a critical Trip
Improved Reflexive Shield: May use Shield Block to protect both self and adjacent allies
Improved Twin Riposte: May use an additional Reaction to make a Twin Riposte once per turn
Incredible Aim: (2) May gain +2 on a ranged Strike that ignores concealment
Incredible Improvisation: (F) May add +4 to an untrained skill check once per day
Incredible Ricochet: (1) May follow a ranged Strike with another against the same foe that ignores concealment and cover
Intimidating Strike: (2) May make a melee Strike that inflicts frightened 1 if successful (critical hit frightened 2)
Knockdown: (2) May follow a successful Strike with an Athletics check to Trip
Lunge: (1) May make a +5' melee Strike
Lunging Stance: (1) Stance gives +5' reach on Attacks Of Opportunity
Mirror Shield: (R) May reflect a spell back upon caster with a ranged Strike or spell attack
Mobile Shot Stance: (1) Stance negates Reactions from ranged Strikes and allows using Attack Of Opportunity with a loaded ranged weapon on an adjacent creature
Multishot Stance: (1) Stance reduces Double Shot/Triple Shot penalty to -1/-2
Orc Ferocity: (R) May retain 1 Hit Point when brought to 0 Hit Points once per day
Paragon's Guard: (1) Stance gives continuous benefits of Raise a Shield
Point-Blank Shot: (1) Stance negates volley penalty from a ranged volley weapon and gives +2 attack at close range with a ranged non-volley weapon
Positioning Assault: (2) May move target 5' to within reach on a successful Strike with a 2-handed melee weapon
Power Attack: (2) May make a melee Strike that inflicts 3 extra dice damage and counts as two Strikes for multiple attack penalty
Powerful Shove: May use Aggressive Block and Brutish Shove on foes two sizes larger/Shoved creatures take 5 damage from hitting a barrier
Quick Reversal: (1) May Strike two foes flanking self
Quick Shield Block: May use an additional Reaction for a Shield Block once per turn
Reactive Shield: (R) May make a Raise a Shield action when hit by a melee Strike
Revealing Stab: (2) May leave a piercing weapon embedded in a corporeal concealed or hidden foe to reveal it to others
Savage Critical: Successful rolls of 19 with a legendary weapon are critical successes
Shatter Defenses: (1) A successful Strike vs. a frightened foe inflicts flat-footed while frightened condition lasts
Shield Block: (R) When shield is raised, may negate damage up to its hardness and have it absorb half of remaining damage
Shield Warden: May use Shield Block to protect an adjacent ally
Shielded Stride: May Stride at half Speed with shield raised without triggering Reactions
Snagging Strike: (1) May make a Strike that inflicts flat-footed on target for 1 rd if successful
Spring Attack: (1) May Strike a foe after Striding away from another
Stance Savant: (F) May enter a stance during initiative
Sudden Charge: (2) May make a melee Strike after a double Stride
Sudden Leap: (2) May make a Strike during a Leap, High Jump, or Long Jump
Swipe: (2) May attack 2 adjacent foes with a single Strike
Triple Shot: May use Double Shot against a single foe/May use 2 actions to make 3 ranged Strikes, suffering a -4 attack penalty on each
Twin Parry: (1) May parry with two weapons to gain +1 AC for 1 rd (+2 AC if either weapon has the parry trait)
Twin Riposte: (R) When using Twin Parry, may Strike or Disarm a foe who critically fails a Strike on self
Twinned Defense: (1) Stance gives continuous benefits of Twin Parry
Two-Weapon Flurry: (1) May Strike with two weapons
Weapon Legend: Attack Legendary in simple and martial weapons and Attack Master in advanced weapons of chosen group
Weapon Specialization: +4/+6/+8 HP damage with expert/master/legendary weapon proficiency
Weapon Supremacy: Permanently quickened; may use additional actions only to Strike
Whirlwind Strike: (3) May Strike each foe within reach
Save: Fortitude: +30 (constitution; master); Reflex: +30 (dexterity; master); Will: +28 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Evasion: Save Master (Reflex)
Juggernaut: Save Master (Fortitude)
Bravery: Successes on Will saves vs. fear are critical successes/Reduces value of frightened condition by 1
Determination: (1) May end a nonpermanent spell (level 10 Will save) or condition affecting self once per day
Evasion: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental control are critical successes/Foe Intimidation (Coerce) fails are critical fails
Juggernaut: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Reflexive Shield: Raised shield adds shield bonus to Reflex saves
Notes
Validation Errors: Class Feats Allocation: 11 available vs. 74 allocated
